nodes.bodyText: What actually needs to be done here to convert the user management server response into the study metadata response? The user management server is returning json, so it seems like if the call succeeds the response should just be forwarded as is.

Ideally we shouldn't need to convert anything. I haven't figured out how to forward the response as is (but I imagine it shouldn't be hard). I'll do that in a separate change. Updated the comment here.

nit: Indentation seems a little weird here. As far as I can tell, the coding style appears to be two spaces for a tab (this is what Google's Java formatter does so if you have the settings for that it should work).
Oops. Fix the indentation. Thanks for the catch!
